author: WIRED Staff
title: The Videogames WIRED Is Playing While Staying Home
description: Looking for something to pass the time while you're social distancing? These games have been working for us.
content: We live in exceedingly strange and challenging times. Now more than ever, simple acts like sharing what games we're into, what art is helping us cope, feel vital and essential. To that end, below are the games a few of us here at WIRED have been playing while… [+7363 chars]
